text: Uha paka hai jihara ika rata apane bade (muhamada sa.) Nu masajida-e-harama (ka'aba? Tom dura usa masajida (baita-ula-mukadasa) jisa de vatavarana nu asim barakata vala bana'i'a hai, de kola lai gi'a. Tam ki asim usa nu apani'am kujha nisani'am dikha saki'e. Besaka uha sunana vala vekhana vala hai
